author: cms-patatrack
body:
#### PR description:

Update the `runTheMatrix.py` workflows for pixel-only tracking:
  - ###.501: pixel-only quadruplets on CPU 
  - ###.502: pixel-only quadruplets on GPU
  - ###.505: pixel-only triplets on CPU
  - ###.506: pixel-only triplets on GPU

#### PR validation:

Changes in use in the Patatrack releases.
In particular, see [this report](https://github.com/cms-patatrack/cmssw/pull/549#issuecomment-707133106).

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Includes changes from:
  - cms-patatrack#20 Add workflows for Riemann fit and GPU
  - cms-patatrack#23 Add a DQM sequence for pixel-only tracking
  - cms-patatrack#60 Port the Riemann fit to CUDA
  - cms-patatrack#144 Add pixel tracking workflows for data
  - cms-patatrack#259 Change GPU workflow numbering: .7->.51, .8->.52, .9->.53
  - cms-patatrack#338 Rework the Riemann fit and broken line fit
  - cms-patatrack#549 Update the RelVal workflows and the CPU customisation
title: Patatrack integration - Pixel workflows (12/N)
